response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for it. This price reflects the quality and utility of the product while ensuring a fair profit for me. I understand this might be a significant investment, but I'm confident it will pay off in terms of the benefits it will bring to your operations or personal use. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to consider this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
